industry_analysis.cost_trend: Increasing due to advanced node (3nm/5nm) wafer costs, complex packaging (CoWoS, 3D), and higher R&D. Foundry price hikes contribute significantly.
industry_analysis.main_cost_driver: Advanced node wafer cost (TSMC N5/N4/N3) and advanced packaging (CoWoS-L, CoWoS-R, Foveros).

data_caveats: All cost figures are ESTIMATES based on teardown analysis (e.g., TechInsights), financial reports, and industry consensus. R&D allocation is a per-unit ESTIMATE based on total R&D spend and projected unit sales. Actual costs are proprietary. Margins calculated based on estimated cost vs. known wholesale/retail pricing. Intel Arc Battlemage cost data is premature/unavailable.
